title: Hour 1 - Paul Lukas (04-16-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Paul Lukas (04-16-20)
description:
Paul Lukas watches all the uniforms in the NFL; he says the Cleveland Browns moved forward by going backwards to the classic look. Dan says sports not coming back the same; with no fans in the stands. Dan talks about sports being used as a way to jump the economy or NOT!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
